name: Phoenix Solarized-Dark
description: Dark theme for phoenix.corvidae.org using the Solarized (https://github.com/altercation/solarized) palette.
additional_info:
0.11 (04/18/16)
Further work on colors associated with users and profiles.
Additional comments added; everything still needs to be reorganized.

0.1  (04/17/16)
Initial upload with focus on most used pages (index, unread content, comment threads, etc).
Many details still not present, particularly with floating cards, menus, and hover/active styles.
Different elements are commented with their purpose; however, they are somewhat vague still.

Colors used:

#002b36 Background
#002f39 Alt-Background
#073642 Emphasized Background
#586e75 Highlighted/Focused Background

#839496 Body text
#93a1a1 Emphasized text
#dc322f Primary buttons (Submit Post, etc)
#6c71c4 Page titles
#268bd2 Forum titles, Stream sorting
#2aa198 Default link color
#859900 Usernames
